p: Before treatment, all animals were given oral saline with a volume of 15 mL/kg body weight. 19 Each group then received standard drug, water and various doses of extract. Immediately after dosing, the rats were placed individually in a metabolic cage. The urine was then collected, measured and the pH determined at one, two, three, four, and five hours. Finally, the urine was stored at −20°C for electrolyte analysis.
